summary: MOTORCYCLE TEMPERATURE CLIMBED INTO THE RED/ FLUID LEAK.  MR. WHILE RIDING THE MOTORCYCLE, THE CONSUMER NOTICED THE TEMPERATURE GAUGE HAD RAISED, THE CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO PULL OVER AND DISCOVERED 1/2 OF FLUID COMING FROM THE TOP OF THE RADIATOR, AFTER 10 MINUTES THE MOTORCYCLE WAS RESTARTED AND THE TEMPERATURE GAUGE WENT DOWN.   *JB
